name: Interworlds
description: Worlds are inter-connected. If you do something to the mini-world, a bigger "you" in a bigger world will do the same thing to your world. With this magic, you will solve puzzles and fight with enemies throughout the adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 OR AMD Radeon R9290 DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11
